title.rendered: Apple and Blackberry Strain | F1 Auto

content.rendered:
🍏 Apple and Blackberry Strain – F1 Autoflowering Seeds by Tastebudz Syndicate

28% THC Power, Rich Berry Flavour – A Modern Indica You’ll Crave

The Apple and Blackberry strain is a next-level indica autoflower created by Tastebudz Syndicate by crossing Pink Apple Soda with Purple Punch. This compact yet powerful F1 auto delivers knockout potency, flavour-packed terpenes, and high yields in a fast-growing format.

With a whopping 28% THC, this strain offers serious firepower with a soothing, body-focused high. Whether you’re chasing flavour, effect, or reliability in your autoflowering lineup, Apple and Blackberry F1 Auto is a standout choice.

📊 Apple and Blackberry Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Pink Apple Soda x Purple Punch (F1 Auto)
Strain Type Indica-Dominant Autoflowering Hybrid
Flowering Time 8–9 Weeks
Indoor Yield 550–600g/m² (info only)
THC Content Up to 28%
Flavours Sweet berries, citrus, herbal spice
Aromas Fruity, earthy, slightly floral
Effects Relaxing, euphoric, stress-relieving

🍇 Flavour & Aroma of the Apple and Blackberry Strain

If flavour is your priority, the Apple and Blackberry strain doesn’t disappoint. Expect a fruity burst of ripe berries and sweet apple on the inhale, followed by zesty citrus and subtle herbal undertones on the exhale. The aroma is equally rich — a blend of berry, floral spice, and earthy hash that fills the room and lingers on the palate.

😌 Effects: Euphoric Calm Meets Mental Clarity

Designed for relaxation without full couchlock, Apple and Blackberry F1 Auto promotes a mellow body high that soothes tension while keeping your mind pleasantly clear. It’s ideal for those evening moments when you want to unwind without crashing — or for managing physical discomfort while staying present.

Expect euphoric waves of calm followed by long-lasting physical ease. It’s a balanced indica-dominant strain that prioritises comfort, focus, and flavour.

🌿 Apple and Blackberry Strain Seed Collector Notes

Apple and Blackberry F1 Auto is a compact, resin-rich strain from our premium autoflowering lineup. These feminized cannabis seeds are prized by collectors for their strong structure, balanced genetics, and fast lifecycle — typically completing their full cycle in just 8–9 weeks from seed.

Thanks to its F1 hybrid stability, this strain has become a favourite among both seasoned collectors and newcomers seeking high terpene potential and 28% THC performance in a streamlined Autoflowering format.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions About the Apple and Blackberry Strain

1. What is the Apple and Blackberry strain?
It’s an autoflowering indica strain developed by crossing Pink Apple Soda with Purple Punch. Known for its 28% THC, fruity flavour, and relaxing effects, it’s a strong choice for those who enjoy sweet strains with impact.

2. What does Apple and Blackberry F1 Auto taste like?
A fruity fusion of apple, berries, citrus, and herbal spice. It’s a smooth smoke with a dessert-like twist that keeps your palate intrigued from start to finish.

3. How strong is the Apple and Blackberry strain?
Very strong — with THC levels up to 28%, it’s one of the most potent strains in the Tastebudz autoflowering lineup.

4. Is this strain good for new growers?
Yes. Thanks to its compact size, autoflowering genetics, and strong structure, it’s suitable for all levels — especially indoor growers with limited space.

5. How long does Apple and Blackberry F1 Auto take to flower?
This strain completes its lifecycle in just 8 to 9 weeks, offering fast returns without compromising on quality or yield.

✅ Why Choose the Apple and Blackberry Strain?

With high THC, complex flavour, and compact growing characteristics, the Apple and Blackberry strain is the perfect addition to any collector’s stash. It delivers on every front — taste, yield, speed, and effect — making it a no-brainer for indica fans and autoflower growers alike.

If you’re looking for a reliable, flavour-forward strain that packs serious potency in a short grow window, this one’s for you.

🔄 Enjoyed the Apple and Blackberry Strain? Discover More F1 Autos

If the Apple and Blackberry Strain impressed you with its fruity flavour, 28% THC, and fast autoflowering cycle, you’ll want to check out these other standout F1 hybrids from Tastebudz Syndicate. Designed for collectors who appreciate bold effects and terpene-rich profiles, each strain is part of our premium autoflowering lineup.

  • 🌈 Rainbow Cake F1 Auto – A zesty, uplifting sativa-dominant strain with a citrus-kush twist and 25% THC

  • 🍓 Wild Strawberry F1 Auto – Sweet strawberry and citrus flavours with a focused, euphoric high

  • 🌙 Midnight Moonshine F1 Auto – Earthy pine and sweet hash notes deliver deep body relaxation and 25% THC

Explore the full F1 Auto collection and build a premium, flavour-packed seed collection with Tastebudz Syndicate.

⚖️ Legal Disclaimer (UK Customers)

Cannabis seeds are sold strictly as adult souvenirs. Germination or cultivation of cannabis seeds is illegal in the UK without a government-issued license. Always check your local laws before purchasing. Tastebudz Syndicate encourages responsible and lawful use.
